RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Goal switching
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: Pawns with this quirk can trick prey to accept a different goal for proposals and then switch the goal against the preys preference.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Mischievous
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is mischievous at heart. [PAWN_pronoun] may propose one kind of vore to someone and then pull a fast one and do something entirely different.
